name: Boost Energy
effect:
Boost Energy can be attached only to an Evolved Pokémon. Discard Boost Energy at the end of the turn it was attached. Boost Energy provides {C}{C}{C} Energy. The Pokémon Boost Energy is attached to can’t retreat.
When the Pokémon Boost Energy is attached to is no longer an Evolved Pokémon, discard Boost Energy.
author: Shin-ichi Yoshikawa
